messages: CONSTRAINT `product_categories_productId_products_id_fk` FOREIGN KEY (`productId`) REFERENCES `7P2s8YLp8Q4WBmq2Lyj4MG`.`products` (`id`) ON DELETE CASCADE ON UPDATE NO ACTION,
CONSTRAINT `product_categories_categoryId_categories_id_fk` FOREIGN KEY (`categoryId`) REFERENCES `7P2s8YLp8Q4WBmq2Lyj4MG`.`categories` (`id`) ON DELETE CASCADE ON UPDATE NO ACTION
stdout:
Table	Create Table
product_categories	CREATE TABLE `product_categories` (
  `id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT,
  `productId` int(11) NOT NULL,
  `categoryId` int(11) NOT NULL,
  `isPrimary` int(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0',
  `createdAt` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  PRIMARY KEY (`id`) /*T![clustered_index] CLUSTERED */,
  UNIQUE KEY `unique_product_category` (`productId`,`categoryId`),
  KEY `product_categories_categoryId_categories_id_fk` (`categoryId`),
  CONSTRAINT `product_categories_productId_products_id_fk` FOREIGN KEY (`productId`) REFERENCES `7P2s8YLp8Q4WBmq2Lyj4MG`.`products` (`id`) ON DELETE CASCADE ON UPDATE NO ACTION,
  CONSTRAINT `product_categories_categoryId_categories_id_fk` FOREIGN KEY (`categoryId`) REFERENCES `7P2s8YLp8Q4WBmq2Lyj4MG`.`categories` (`id`) ON DELETE CASCADE ON UPDATE NO ACTION
) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb4 COLLATE=utf8mb4_bin AUTO_INCREMENT=270001
